text: Mongolia competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Mongolia entered four swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Günsennorovyn Zandanbal |align=left|50 m breaststroke |30.23 |=61 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m breaststroke |1:07.92 |79 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Myagmaryn Delgerkhüü |align=left|50 m freestyle |23.93 |72 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m freestyle |54.43 |92 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Batbayaryn Enkhkhüslen |align=left|50 m freestyle |27.66 |58 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m freestyle |59.76 |59 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Khuyagbaataryn Enkhzul |align=left|50 m butterfly |30.80 |51 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |1:14.23 |50 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Mixed {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Event !colspan=2|Heat !colspan=2|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left|Delgerkhuu Myagmar Zandanbal Gunsennorov Enkhzul Khuyagbaatar Enkhkhuslen Batbayar |align=left|4×100 m freestyle relay |3:50.99 |28 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Mongolia at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Mongolian sport
title: Mongolia at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
